H2.text: who scored the most goals in premier league season. Arsenal

H3.text: who scored the most goals in premier league season. Chelsea

A4.text: Haaland scored his 35th league goal of the campaign, surpassing Shearer and Andy Cole's joint record for the most goals scored in a single Premier League season.

A5.text: This broke the previous record of 44 goals across all competitions in a season by a Premier League player held by Salah and Ruud van Nistelrooy.
